Texts.Eng: Additional adjustments need to be made in response to safety, ergonomical and maintenance issues, but everyone is feeling proud and relieved at the moment.
Its construction is the primary goal of this facility, and now that it is completed, we hope to see implementation in the next few years in addition to other beam weapons.
The initial prototype works perfectly. The Stargazers will be pleased. Using the core of avolite crystals, this optics-based weapon is slated to be the first in a line of optics-based weaponry.
